description: Library for generating composite video on Arduino. Wraps Arduino-TVout (https://github.com/Avamander/arduino-tvout). Information on hardware connections can be found here: https://playground.arduino.cc/Main/TVout/
name: arduino-tvout

@/clear-screen.description: Clear screen. Fills screen with black pixels.

@/delay.description: Delays screen update for specified number of milliseconds.

@/delay-n-frames.description: Delay for specified number of frames.

@/draw-circle.description: Draw a circle at X, Y with a specified radius.

BJZ5VxPor.description: The x coordinate of the center of the circle.
BJZ5VxPor.label: X

ByEYtSviB.label: COLOR

S1F5NewoH.description: The y coordinate of the center of the circle.
S1F5NewoH.label: Y

Syy2trwoH.label: FILL

@/draw-column.description: Fill a column between two rows.

B1BH3KBdiB.label: COLOR

Bk4S3KrOiH.description: The column that fill will be performed on.
Bk4S3KrOiH.label: COLUMN

r1mHnYrdsH.description: Edge 0 of the fill. Start fill from this row.
r1mHnYrdsH.label: Y0

rk8r2YrOor.description: Edge 1 of the fill. End fill at this row.
rk8r2YrOor.label: Y1

@/draw-line.description: Draw a line between two points.

HySpABr_sr.label: COLOR

@/draw-pixel.description: Set the color of a pixel.

SyBU-l8_oS.label: COLOR

rJ4UWl8dor.description: The y coordinate of the pixel.
rJ4UWl8dor.label: Y

rJ7UWe8_iB.description: The x coordinate of the pixel.
rJ7UWe8_iB.label: X

@/draw-rectangle.description: Draw a rectangle at X, Y with a specified width and height.

H1VbmfUPjH.description: The y coordinate of upper left corner of the rectangle.
H1VbmfUPjH.label: Y

SJD-Qz8DoS.label: FILL

Sy8-mMIviB.label: COLOR

r17W7zIDiH.description: The x coordinate of upper left corner of the rectangle.
r17W7zIDiH.label: X

@/draw-row.description: Fill a row between two columns.

BkQK_dSOsS.description: Edge 0 of the fill. Start fill from this column.
BkQK_dSOsS.label: X0

H1rKOuBuir.label: COLOR

HJUtddSOiS.description: Edge 1 of fill. End fill at this column.
HJUtddSOiS.label: X1

rkVFudHuiS.description: The row that fill will be performed on.
rkVFudHuiS.label: ROW

B1QTiGO_oS.description: The x coordinate of the cursor.
B1QTiGO_oS.label: X

HkwTjzOOjS.label: FONT

HyETjMOOiH.description: The y coordinate of the cursor.
HyETjMOOiH.label: Y

SJzLV_doH.description: Set cursor position. If true cursor will be moved to the coordinates specified by X and Y. If false text will be printed at current cursor position.
SJzLV_doH.label: XY

rJVt4OOoS.description: String to print. Use \n for new line.
rJVt4OOoS.label: TEXT

@/example-draw-lines.description: Example to demonstrate drawing lines using draw-line, draw-column and draw-row nodes.

HyDfw86iB.content: Draw white rectangle covering left half of screen.

rJrViIpsB.content: Colour of outline of circle will be inverted (COLOR pin set to 2). Circle will be filled with white (FILL pin set to 1).

@/example-draw-shapes.description: Example to show use of draw-rectangle and draw-circle nodes.

@/example-draw-text.description: Example shows the font sizes available on the draw-text node.

@/example-fill-clear.description: Test of fill, clear and delay-n-frames nodes.

@/example-shift-screen.description: Example to demonstrate shifting screen buffer.

@/fill-screen.description: Fill the screen with specified color.

B1SMybDdjH.label: COLOR

@/shift-screen.description: Shift screen up, down, left or right by a specified distance.

H1wln4jiS.label: DIR

@/tvout-device.description: Create a tvout device with specified MODE (PAL or NTSC) and resolution.
